alert.note: Alert for Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern St. Louis, northeastern Carlton and northwestern Douglas Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 829 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from City of Rice Lake, to near Scanlon, to near Mahtowa, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Ponding of water on roads and significantly reduced visibility. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hermantown around 835 PM CDT. City of Rice Lake around 845 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Superior, Proctor, Oliver, French River and Stoney Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive through flood waters.
